name: Z U C C
description:
You are the Z U C C - A Robo-Lizard-Dot in the most fun and challenging game of 2018!

Guide Data falling from the cloud into your computer, but don't let any blocks touch it or it will break!

Move the ZUCC with one finger to protect your computer. Clear the way and put into your computer! When you gather enough data, get some upgrades tocollect even more data!

If you collect enough data in this exciting adventure, the ZUCC might become a real human one day.

Game Features:
- Free to play
- Endless gameplay
- Many upgrades
- One finger control
- You get to be the Z U C C
